author: remm
msg: - Conditional compilation variables were not properly set for some reason,
probably because this buildfile is actually called from the main buildfile.
As a result, neither Tyrex nor JTA is needed anymore to build Tomcat 4.

author: remm
msg: - Also generates javadoc for the org.apache.naming package.

author: remm
msg: - Added some JavaDoc documentation about configuring the Tyrex factories,
as well as links to the Tyrex website.

author: craigmcc
msg: Oops ... forgot the "jdb" calls for the debug option.

author: craigmcc
msg: Use "$JAVA_HOME/bin/java" instead of "java" to execute the JVM, to ensure
that the correct runtime (based on the setting of JAVA_HOME) is selected,
no matter what is on the user's path.  This functionality already exists
in the Windows version of the startup script.
